Profile

A self-taught web developer from Toronto looking to apply my skills and experience in fast-paced and high-pressure environments to a new learning experience.

Summary of Skills

Languages: Ruby, JavaScript, PHP, HTML5, CSS3, Sass/SCSS

Tools and Frameworks: Rails, AngularJS, jQuery, RSpec, Heroku, Jekyll, Foundation, Git

Work Experience

(2014-2015)
